name: Breakout
tagline: Breakout game coded using HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript
body:
# BREAKOUT!
## HTML5/CSS3 Experiments

***

A re-visit of the Breakout game with a twist.  This one is written using HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript only.  It will run on personal computer browsers and also on mobile devices without changing the source code.


Another one of my playtime projects, but an interesting experiment in cross-platform responsive development using HTML5's _**canvas**_ and _**audio**_ elements.

***

Mark Addinall
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
